issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

assignee.name: myrna
assignee.emailAddress: m dot v dot lunteren at gmail dot com

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body:
fixed by committing revision:
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=477526

- added additional masters.
- also fixed up mistakenly modified DerbyNet/LobTest.out.

M    java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/master/DerbyNet/LOBTest.out
